name: Food Expert
description: Specialized in translating food-related content, ensuring accurate and idiomatic translations for culinary terms, ingredients, cooking techniques, and food-related content.
author: immersive

zh-CN.name: 美食
zh-CN.description: 专门翻译美食相关内容，确保烹饪术语、食材、烹饪技巧和美食相关内容的准确性和地道性。

zh-TW.name: 美食
zh-TW.description: 專門翻譯美食相關內容，確保烹飪術語、食材、烹飪技巧和美食相關內容的準確與地道翻譯。
